short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension disables Telegram web messenger from blinking from Telegram Web and 1 notification when a message is received.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension disables Telegram web messenger from blinking from Telegram Web and 1 notification when a message is received.
